version_description:
- Music & Sound Effects
- Brand new high level investments including: Space Elevator, Doge Donut, Planet X, and Wormhole
- New Pickaxe: Deep Sea Pickaxe
- Upgrades to support the new investments
- Fixed in app purchases
- Redesigned interfaces
- Redesigned & rebalanced pickaxes
- Redesigned stats interface
- Rebalanced Bounty Bags
- Pickaxe swinging & counter
- Audio settings
- Push notifications
- Fixed minor bugs

Our shibes have finally built a spaceship so that YOU can finally go to the moon!! Explore the new environment with brand new investments and upgrades!

Also:
- Portrait mode!
- Completely redesigned interface for easier navigation, and most icons/sprites have been completely redesigned from scratch
- New investments and upgrades
- Redesigned Stats
- Spaceship Bounties
- Reworked in-app purchases
- Reworked bounties

Winter Update!

This includes:
- Collect Snowballs
- Unlockable Snowy Background
- Santa Hat
- Drone
- Christmas Present Boxes

Happy Holidays!

- Brand new intro and tutorial
- Updated UI
- Performance Upgrades

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

We are always improving and updating the game to keep things fresh and fun.

Todays update:
- Pickaxe Buff
- Bug Fixes
- Pickaxe swing achievements (100 swings, 1,000 swings, 10,000 swings)
